channel.title: Networking on Data Day(s) 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Data Day(s) 2021

item.title: Slack - Event chat
item.description: Join the conversation at #istiocon channel in the Istio Slack and get all the event details while you chat with other event attendees, comment on the sessions and interact with speakers.

item.title: Office hours
item.description: Join the office hours at gather.town on Wednesday, February 24th, from 10:45 - 13:00 GMT -8, and contact with the Istio community experts. Link to Office hours.

item.title: Photo booth
item.description: If there is no selfie then it didn’t happen, right? Visit https://istiocon.virtualbooth.co to take your picture and share it at the #istiocon-photobooth in the Istio slack.

item.title: Social event
item.description: Join us at gather.town on Thursday, February 25th, after the morning block (14:20 - 16:20 GMT -8), and get a portrait cartoon, play video games, and network with the Istio community. Link to the event.

item.title: Trivia
item.description: Challenge your techie skills by participating at the event trivia at the #istiocon slack channel, and win a $100usd gift card.

item.title: Feedback
item.description: Help us improve by completing the event evaluation and win a $100 USD gift card. Link to evaluation.
